SEARCH
Package org.apache.trevni.avro

Class AvroColumnReader<D>

java.lang.Object
org.apache.trevni.avro.AvroColumnReader<D>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<D>, Iterator<D>
public class AvroColumnReader<D> extends Object implements Iterator<D>, Iterable<D>, Closeable
Read files written with AvroColumnWriter. A subset of the schema used for writing may be specified when reading. In this case only columns of the subset schema are read.
